channel.title: Java trouble
channel.description:
When I try to compile it says '"C\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin" is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file Press any key to continue . . .
I have tried changing my properties in Java and everything can anyone please help? That would be greatly appreciated, if you would like you could use T.V. and help me if that would be easier thanks :)

item.title: Java trouble
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“1 2 3 4 KOED, post:1, topic:420913”]When I try to compile it says '“C\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin” is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file
Press any key to continue . . .

I have tried changing my properties in Java and everything can anyone please help? That would be greatly appreciated, if you would like you could use T.V. and help me if that would be easier thanks :)[/quote]
change the jdk1.6.0_25 with ur current version go to C: Program files Java and ull see ur jdk there copy the name and paste it instead of jdk1.6.0_25

item.title: Java trouble
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

If you using windows 7 make sure your enviroment variables and compiler says \Program Files (x86)\ and if not make sure you are loading the correct java \jdk1.6.0_25\bin.

Change the 25 to whatever java you have, lets say you have jdk update 21. You would make it \jdk1.6.0_21\bin. If you have jdk update 7, make it \jdk1.7.0\bin.

Read full topic

item.title: Java trouble
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Mines this:
@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
